Plot: A true-story account of a German businessman who saved more than 200,000 Chinese during the Nanjing massacre in 1937-38.
Title: City of War: The Story of John Rabe
Actors: Ulrich Tukur, Daniel Brühl, Steve Buscemi, Anne Consigny
tomatoConsensus: Though it strays into predictable melodrama, John Rabe is worth watching for the light it shines on a neglected corner of Chinese history.
Language: Cantonese, Mandarin, German, Japanese, English, Ukrainian
